title: BONUS episode with Duncan Hall (Tutor2U)
description: In this episode, Matthew interviews Duncan Hall who is subject lead for Sociology and Politics at Tutor2U, a company that provide resources and run conferences for Sociology students up and down the country.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew interviews Duncan Hall who is subject lead for Sociology and Politics at Tutor2U, a company that provide resources and run conferences for Sociology students up and down the country.
